column5: I have been growing hot peppers for a few years now and these babies are the biggest yet, with the largest being 8.5"....   They were great stuffed.......
Nice looking peppers. What seed strain?
very nice - i certainly wouldn't want to pull out mine and measure up to those!
Hard to diferentiate between the 2.Mainland has a subtle tang of lime, where as the Azores is more robust and woody. Personally i appreciate the lime tingle from the Mainland, but thats just me
Seperate the seeds from the flesh,and ya still got some nice heat.  Nice Bob.
I'm pretty sure if you pinched the tail that would be over 9 inches.
Those pictures bring tears to my eyes.   Betcha they'd be longer if you ran the tape along the outside curve
yup i just stuff some of my jalepenos from the backyard.. yum;   Whats your stuffing receipe of choice?

Now you just have to make some hot pepper jelly  and some hot sauce out of some of them! Heck you can make that one of your secret ingredients in the Captian Bob's shrimp dish.  BTW served them to CPH and his lovely lady the other night (full credits to you) and they loved them too! It is one of Sue and mine favorites! Thanks again!
Cliff, did you wash them down with a Lancaster Ice Tea....
LOL no my friend, I'll save that as a special treat when you come to visit.
We are having a family picnic so I had to pick up a big bottle of Jose'...
